Summary.item0: Improvement. The button to register with google account is not displayed on the registration form.

Description.item0: When you click Add to favourite on the https page capital.com

Steps_to_reproduce.item0: 1. Click on the button Add to favourite

Actual_result.item0: The icon for google account is not shown on the button

Expected_result.item0: The icon for google account should be displayed on the button

Additional_Information.item0: Ad Blocker is blocking this icon
